1.1.name: wordpress/wp-developer-plugin-stats
1.1.description:
This plugin displays WordPress Developers Plugin stats in widgets for admin page or any public pages. Allows plugin developers to monitor their plugins statistics such as downloads and rating. Widget displays a developers top 5 plugins, sorted by download count.

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com

Plugin Page: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-developer-plugin-stats/
